Headline: #26 South Shore Express and #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at South Shore/82nd
ShortDescription: 26 South Shore Express & 71 71st/South Shore buses rrtd in both directions via Commercial, 83rd, Yates, 79th & South Shore due to blockage nr South Shore/82nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#26 South Shore Express and # 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Commercial. 83rd, Yates, 79th and South Shore due to street blockage near South Shore/82nd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Midway-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Pulaski.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
